mapper.sql: id, PERNR, WERKS, BTRTL, PERSG, PERSK, ABKRS, PLANS, ORGEH, NACHN, VORNA, GBDAT, GESCH, DAT01, GBDEP, LOCAT, FAMST, SLART, ZXXXX, ZSXZY, USRID_5, POSTY, POSNC, ORGEH_1, ORGEH_2, ORGEH_3, USRID_3, GBLND, INSTI, GBORT, ZLPOS, ZPOSTY, ZTDETAIL, ICNUM, ZBMCJ, DATUM, ZDATE, USRID_4, RACKY, PCODE, DAT02, ZGCLB, ORGEH_4, ORGEH_5, ORGEH_6, NATIO, AUTH1, POSSC, TERMN, RUFNM, BEZEI
mapper.select:
select DISTINCT i.id,i.PERNR,i.WERKS,i.BTRTL,i.PERSG,i.PERSK,i.ABKRS,i.PLANS,o.STEXT as ORGEH,i.NACHN,i.VORNA,i.GBDAT,i. GESCH,i.DAT01,i.GBDEP,i.LOCAT,i.FAMST,i.SLART,i.ZXXXX,i.ZSXZY,i.USRID_5,i.POSTY,i.POSNC,i.ORGEH_1,i. ORGEH_2,i.ORGEH_3,i.USRID_3,i.GBLND,i.INSTI,i.GBORT,i.ZLPOS,i.ZPOSTY,i.ZTDETAIL,i.ICNUM,i.ZBMCJ,i. DATUM,i.ZDATE,i.USRID_4,i.RACKY,i.PCODE,i.DAT02,i.ZGCLB,i.ORGEH_4,i.ORGEH_5,i.ORGEH_6,i.NATIO,i. AUTH1,i.POSSC,i.TERMN,i.RUFNM,i.BEZEI from zhr2_001 i left join zhr2_002 o on i.ORGEH=o.orgeh
1=1
and pernr like concat(concat('%',#{personInfo}),'%') or plans like concat(concat('%',#{personInfo}),'%') or concat(nachn,vorna) like concat(concat('%',#{personInfo}),'%')
